aka: Pigs Don't Look Up To The Sky

writer.name: H. P. 洛夫克拉夫特 H. P. Lovecraft

director.name: 大卫·德科提奥 David DeCoteau

trans_title: Pigs Don't Look Up To The Sky
introduction: In this horror anthology edited from older Full Moon releases, three tales of terror are told. In "ASCENT FROM HELL" ('Dark Angel: The Ascent') an young demon female escapes Hell and comes to Earth where she becomes the punisher of sinners. "INFINITE EVIL" ('The Lurking Fear') a race of cannibalistic genetic creatures live below a cemetery and hunt humans for food. In EVIL NEVER DIES ('Talisman'), the Black Angel is summoned from his resting place to bring about the end of the world
